content: Lately I've been having issues with Amazon app. Specially learning that the sellers are using drop shipping to sell the items. It does not allows you to choose from which country the items gets shipped from. The ones I've ordered with Amazon prime have been getting shipped from China, which takes almost a month to be delivered. So, why pay prime then if most this will be as late as the one you order off from Wish or Alli Express. Total disappointment and loss of money on a membership.

one of the richest companies in the world and their app is ass. it's basically pulling everything up like a webpage inside the app. the buttons are extremely hard to touch and basically give no feedback and it takes about 15 tries in order to bring up a product image. WALMART has a better and more user friendly app than amazon. it's 2020, not 2005.

They updated the app to make it as useless as possible. You can't just scroll down through all options. You have to tap to go through page after page. You can't select US only vendors, which means it's more difficult to weed out the Chinese counterfeits...and they are everywhere on Amazon. You can filter by brand, but doesn't show every brand and won't allow you to select several at one time. You have to tap on filter again to select each additional brand. They ruined a perfectly good app.

I use amazon constantly it is very convenient. I have noticed a spike in pricing on items that i know i could get cheaper if i had the time to go to the store and purchase it myself. I pay for prime benefits to guarantee a faster delivery being in the same day. Now i have contacted customer care through their chat feature lastnight when a $30 gratuity was offered for my inconvenience and still have not received the gratuity.

This app is so frustrating. There is an ongoing problem with getting things I click to register. For instance, when I try to click on a size for ordering shoes, nothing happens. Then if that finally decides to work, I can't get the 'add to cart' button to click no matter what I do. None of the updates have ever resolved this issue, and it's been a problem right from the start. I just might be done with Amazon!

Poor customer service. Was left on hold for over 10 minutes after being pushed off from one cs rep to another. Deliveries are always late. Even with prime membership, no more 1 to 2 day delivery. They didn't honor their ad. They didn't match the price. Definitely not worth paying $13 a month anymore. I'll just stick with Netflix and Roku for movies and shows, and cancel prime.

It works. Slowly. Startup takes forever and it feels like a glorified web app. The menu and many buttons don't feel native at all. That said, prime shipping is great usually. Except for the occasional problem where they mark an item as having prime shipping, but it takes 4 or 5 days. Then it feels like a scam. Overall, Amazon has good products at decent prices, but the app is kinda meh.

Worst app ever! Refreshes after each selection so you have to go back every time you want to add a condition, Amazon expects you to have the sorting options committed to memory since hitting the back button goes back to the search page, have to press the next button to see the next batch of products instead of seamless scrolling. Worst user experience in all the shopping apps I've used.

I've been an ebay shopper for many. Friends talked me into trying Amazon. This app is bad. I did a search for milwaukee packout dolly on ebay app and 90% results was what I was looking for, Amazon's results revealed bubblegum machines, golf clubs, etc, oh, and 1 of what I was looking for. Wth? The other issue is you can only review a few results at a time, then keep tapping next. Thanks but no thanks.

I am a long time customer and primarily have done my shopping via the app. Like several reviewers, the past update has caused it to be annoying and frustrating. First of all, what's with the ads replacing the "see more like this"? Secondly, hitting the next button was an unnecessary addition. However, one thing I do like is the ability to rate the delivery experience.

Lowered app rating from new update when they removed the option to see similar items at the bottom of a listing and instead replaced it with "related posts" that just look like ads. Much less helpful when searching for what you want to buy. Terrible to have to search through pages of listings, hitting next and not being able to easily find a prior listing. Long lag times and frustrating to not be able to choose multiple filters then apply them all. It's all directed at showing more ad listings.

Load times for filters ruins this. So slow! No different than using the site on a mobile browser in which case why bother using an app. Too bad Amazon will miss out on purchases of mine because I always say....nah I'd rather just wait and do it on my pc or laptop. By then I often forget what I was shopping for and don't shop for several more weeks, if at all. If I were Bezos I would tear his IT department a new one for still not having fixed this. You're losing revenue due to this guaranteed.

The app works really well until I get to the payment/delivery options screen. If I try to make an adjustment - for example, when changing from standard delivery to free delivery - I just get a spinning wheel and I can't complete my order. It is very frustrating. This has been a long-standing issue, across more than one device. If not for this bug, I would give the app a five star rating.

I love Amazon but after the last update you can only look at 10 items per page and you can only filter searches one at a time. It has made shopping in Amazon an annoyance which makes me look elsewhere for product. Dropped my rating down to one star. I just can't anymore with the app. The new filtering makes the app mind numbingly slow. And each update adds a new problem or a "feature" that makes it less user friendly

As a Amazon Prime member I like using this app. However I notice it has been gotten a bit worse. Lately I tried to filter out my search in order to get the things I need. Like 90% it glitches and does not work. Besides that interface could be more smoother. I like the Amazon but this app could be better in my opinion. Update: they have sorted of fixed the filtering feature but it's far from perfect. It's a bit laggy but doable...

Careful with the "free" Prime trial.. it does not automatically cancel . Therefor they end up charging you without any notice. No wonder its a multi-billion dollar company when they can reach into your pockets and simply take money (Yes.. I know... read the fine print right, cause everyone does that). I have also found that there is a lot of cheap knock off products through amazon posing as the the real thing. Read about your purchases and research the seller carefully if you are looking for quality products.

When I purchased my mobile, it came with an Amazon app. Then Amazon stopped supporting that app, forcing me to download this "new" one to continue using its service (the old app just links to the download page of the new one when launched); however, I can't uninstall the old, bloatware app to make room for the new one. The additional kick in the pants was after deleting other apps to fit this new one, it runs worse than the old one! It's consistently loading slower if at all! Absolute garbage.

Why is this app so slow? One of the world's largest tech companies that specializes in shopping and this is the worst, most frustrating app I am currently using. Images take more than 7secs to load and then only potato quality, you have to load another image to zoom in on it wasting further time, size and colours are selectable to only be told they're out of stock, scrolling is unresponsive... the list goes on. Sort your app out Bezos!

The app is really easy to navigate. However, I end up having to use the desktop site a lot as there is no option to filter by my own set price range on the app. E.g. if I'm searching for an item that I don't want to pay more than Â£5 for, I can only filter items under Â£15, so 2/3 of the items are useless.

Doesn't work anymore. This update made your app useless. Keeps crashing. Fails to load. Yes, I've tried to delete and reinstall but the app came preloaded on my cell and all I can do is disable, but then it still won't work. Tried turning off my phone also, still won't work. Nice work.

Awful. The app is so glitchy and difficult to navigate, that I typically end up throwing my phone aside frustrated and pulling out my laptop. It isn't worth spending triple the time to find something that it does using the browser. Only reason I keep the app is so I can check the progress on my orders. That part works fine thankfully.

Big Enterprise Small Development I've been a prime customer and I am not satisfied with the service that amazon provides. Firstly, their customer support is untraceable via the app. The app has a poor design and looks primitive. The returns/refunds & track shipment section is useless as it keeps you in loop no matter what option you select. There is no live tracking for your ordered goods.

All of the newer versions error every time i try to look something up. I looked on the forrums and there are no fixes and amazon support are obviously incompetent due to the fact that they are incapable of anything other than copy pasting some tech support bs. Its a good thing I actually have a brain and can do troubleshooting otherwise I wouldn't have been able to figure out that the only way to fix this is to download an older version apk from the internet and not update it.

Update! The issue with the crashing has been resolved with newer updates. It works great, just like it used to prior to the issues. The 9/3/2019 update causes my app to crash each time I try to search for an item. The app was great until the update. I have to go to the Playstore to uninstall the updates and it will work fine a few times before it is automatically updated again. I have to start the process again.

Too many fake reviews, but would greatly appreciate a dark mode. May have some issues with some products' images being indistinguishable from the background, but I'll take that over burning my eyes and having a slightly reduced battery life. Besides, dark mode would make users want to stay on the app longer, making them more likely to make a purchase. Win win for all.

Literally the worst app on my phone. It freezes if you click a picture. It freezes if you click a quantity. It freezes pretty much doing anything except scrolling. I've started shopping more on my Walmart app since it actually works better (which isn't saying much). Get your stuff together Amazon. All of your apps are a joke!

Can you please update this app to a 2020 standard? Feels like it's been stuck in 2012 and a mere webview is being used to display Amazon's website. You guys are also super rich, can't you just do that like every other service? Follow the Material Design guidelines, please. The performance of this app is also not optimal: I've been using it on a Google Pixel (1st gen, quite old), and some parts of the UI are just laggy. You have to remember it's just a simple shopping app â€” it MUST NOT do this.

Just type in the name of a description of item you want to purchase and hit enter. You will have a lot of items and price ranges for you to pick from. Read other consumers opinions which might guide you in a better direction. Put purchases in cart and check out. You have an opportunity to change information before everything ships. I have never had anything but easy transactions.

Why auto-playing advertising videos?!?! Everyone hates those. App has no forward button. If you accidentally hit the back button twice like I do because my fingers shake then you have to start all over again. I much prefer the web browser even though it is not fully functional. I can't imagine it would take too much effort to add a forward button...

Don't count on delivery dates. Twice in a week Amazon has failed to deliver my order. They claim on one that the labels fell off. The newest one hasn't been explained. They expected me to be there and decline delivery to get a refund. The burden shouldn't be on me. After speaking to 6 CS reps they finally promised to refund my money, but I haven't seen it yet. We'll see in 3-5 hours. I'm ready to cancel my Prime account. Why pay for horrible service when I can get it for free? Amazon sucks.

Its all about service well,. I surely was able to save some money and time wise two out of three items out of three were there in a reasonable time frame the other the third well took a extra two weeks. But all in all it worked out fine. For the price and quality I was over all very satisfied as well as got a ton of compliments on my over all attire and appearance from head to toe thanks to the wide variety of color and styles that were available from Amazon.

Looking for pencil cases and Amazon is only showing 1 product. Literally. It was fine a few days ago but everything I search, there's only 1 item that pops up. Not even a page of results. I even looked up something basic, like shirts and still the same issue. Is there something I can fix in the settings?

Prior to the filter update I would have rated 4-5 stars, but the new filter and "Next Page" outweigh all the good. Somehow they managed to make the filter worse than it was previous. Getting to correct department without quantities visible is going to be even more difficult. It's hard enough trying to figure out where Amazon puts items the way it was, and now it just seems like they want to persuade what people buy.

Any time I select an item to view it none of the preview pictures show up, nor do the "add to cart" or "buy now" buttons. It goes straight to "items frequently bought together" and then customer reviews. It is no longer possible for me to make any purchases at all and is frustrating to use. Also the new "next" button is somewhat pointless.

Not gonna lie I expected more from you Amazon... The apps feels clunky and weird. It looks like the app someone would make after a year of programming classes. It is literally disgusting to navigate. Also, too many weird bugs. They should have made it like their website. It gets the job done but jeez it's not optimized worth anything. Everything seems rectangle shaped and looks like it's made with freaking html boxes. Please update to make it better and fix these problems

The filters feature has been improved and is much faster!!! Enough to make me immediately come and adjust my review. So far images have been actually loading for a bigger preview when I tap them as well, the only noticable delays I'm seeing at a glance are page changes like going back to the home page or selecting a new style/ model of the same item. Thank you for this update! S9+ User

App barely works for me. There's usually a 5-10second wait after every tap (I counted), cart won't update, buy with one click doesn't always work. Every so often the app is usuable but for the most part it's unuseable and constantly freezing. I've been hoping they'd update and fix whatever's causeing the issue but since I got this phone 3 or 4 years ago I don't think it's wide spread enough of a problem for then to care/know about.

Overcharged/ scammed I cancelled my subscription and days later was charged again for monthly membership and instead of my membership ending the end of the month it was immediately cut once they took money out. And that's not even the best part, there noone that you can direct your complaint to just trouble shooted avenues. I'm sooo done with Amazon!

Before I tell you the reason why I'm giving three stars; let me express that I love Amazon! they have so many things to offer on their website. But, logistically they are flawed. There's major inconsistency on how & where your packages are delivered, there is no way to compromise in a manner to meet them to receive a package, or go even to the warehouses to pick up the package. Yes, C.S. will request immediate expedition of the package, but they'll avow to say that's all they can do for you!

I have been a prime customer with amazon for years and regularly buy from them. However the latest update to this app has made searching for specific items nearly impossible without clicking through a hundred different windows. Its so difficult to use now that I won't be using the app, such a shame as the previous platform worked well enough

Clunky app. Buttons randomly don't work. The app is pretty slow. This is on an s9+. Incredible that Amazon can't even get an Amazon shopping app right. Like how?? Edit: It is 2020 and this app is still awful. How is Amazon the literal most profitable company on Earth and yet its app is worse than YouTube music. I can't believe it sometimes.

Constantly freezing and crashing when I try to look at options for an item. Tried to get a filter and it crashed. I used to be able to use it just fine, but now it's terrible. Although I can still purchase items just fine, kinda hard to do if you can't cluck on something without ot crashing

For many months now whenever I atempt to get into Amazon via this app within seconds I receive a new screen saying something went wrong on our end. Same thing when I try to get in via a link from another site or an email. Customer support first attempted so.e 3-4 months was completely lame, ineffective, with 0 follow up from Amazon. They are losing a lot of my business.

Generally works well but I would say for the last couple of months there been lots of glitches with this app. Hangs up frequently, in fact to the extent that I have uninstalled it and I'm going to try a reinstall and hope that takes care of the problem. Amazon, you make too much money to not have a top-notch app.

Nothing but issues on their end, and customer gets the shaft every time. Promotional deals are a scam just to get you to add a card to your account and then they come up with a reason why they can't give you the promotion after being on the phone with them for days because they messed something up. Very bad customer service, have an excuse for everything they mess up and turn it around on the customer. Do tons of business with them and get shafted time and time again

poor customer service...got a gift for xmas that i needed to return. customer service told me i would have a credit to my account for the price of the item in 24 to 48 hours. i contacted them after 48 hours after not receiving the credit to my account and now have to wait 7 days for it. They also wanted information from the purchasers account that was irrelevant since i was returning it as i got it as a gift. I am beyond PISSED with Amazon!!!!

Since the last update, this app just takes forever to load a product page. It was slow already and now it's way slower. I believe it's the recent ads and brand or seller recommendations, also images take forever to load. As a Prime member, I use the app more than the website and its sad how even the Amazon website slow it is. The same goes to the business prime; there's no difference. New phone Samsung Note 10+, fast processor and 12Gb of ram. $300 Router w/WiFi 6. Internet 100 MB. No excuses

I tried the "free Trial membership" and I specifically remember canceling it the day it was going to renew and you guys charged me after it stated that it was cancelled, I didn't have any money in my account at the time, making me go in the negative then you guys requested to give me a refund, but the bank already hit me with an overdraft. Thanks ALOT. A**holes.

I absolutely love Amazon as a whole however I really despise the new way to filter when searching products. I wish you would change it back. It now takes entirely too long to filter. It makes no sense to me why you can only choose 1 filter option at a time. AMAZON CHANGE IT BACK!!!! Sincerely a long time loyal customer

Ok, I dont usually write reviews, but this really makes me mad: When you open the app, the first screen is a button which, with one accidental click, signs you up for a subscription to Amazon prime. I've already had to call and reverse charges once on my credit card, since they basically are trying trick ppl into signing up with accidental "one-clicks". Please Stop trying to trick us into joining prime, AMAZON!!! you get enough money without the lame trickery!!!!

No option to print a label... App works fine. I just don't like that the name of the product isn't fully readable and you just see the top half. Same happens with prices in some screens. Maybe it was done on purpose to make you click on the product but it's annoying not being able to see/read the full name of an article or its price.

This app is a life saver for me. Being disabled and unable to go shopping in a store alone is impossible for me. This app allows me to browse and buy with great ease. I love this app! This year I did all my Christmas shopping here and the first time in 9 years my family didn't know what they were getting for Christmas. I have had a couple issues with delivery and Amazon addressed them instantly when I reported them. One billing issue we'll see how they handle that today.

Signed up for Amazon and ordered product with no issues and credit card charges happened like they should have. Then a couple days later get a email from Amazon saying my account is suspended cause of a bad credit card. The transaction went thru on the card just fine and no there is no issue with that card. This is the 2nd time in the past couple years this happened with them so go ahead and suspend it I will take my money else where. SIGNED A VERY ANGRY "EX CUSTOMER"

No way am I giving it all the permissions it wants!!!!! For instance, it wants access to all my contacts!!!!!! Amazon can go to hell!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But then, I hate Amazon because they are trying to drive all other places to buy anything out of business, and take over all shopping on the planet, while paying zero taxes on its enormous profits. I never buy from Amazon if I have any other option.

I don't use this app and it can't be uninstalled, I hate when certain phones have apps / app sponsors make it mandatory for the phone companies to put apps on your phone that are permanently installed, regardless of weather you use it or not. I understand that some of them do support some of the things you do use, so you have to have it installed but why can't it be part of the programming system instead!

I am having problems adding items to my cart with this app, specifically the New & Used button choice does not work for me. The app will show, for example, there are 28 new and used choices, but when I touch that button to access them, nothing happens. When I login and use the Amazon site through an internet browser on my phone, I can access that button and choose a seller for that same item.

They locked my account, cancelled my orders and deleted all of my order history for no reason. Now it's like I had no orders or bought anything. I paid for overnight shipping only to wake up to all of my orders being cancelled and my account locked. This is why I never shop online. I tried to give it a chance but forget that. It's way more convenient to just go to a store.

I had to give 1 star because it doesn't let you give less than that. I've had problems since the last update. I lost my prime icon and now i can't filter my search by prime items anymore. I have to click everything individually and it tells me the next shipping date. Basically the same as people who don't pay for prime... i called costumer support and they told they would look into it... still waiting to hear back ....so sad i night have to cancel my subscription

I'd been using Amazon Prime for a couple years, but when I moved and the Amazon Flex drivers became suddenly incompetent to follow my very clear, very precise delivery instructions, I went to customer service. I've had more interactions with customer service due to terribly delivery way more times than I am comfortable with in a very brief time. Twice I was offered a credit to maintain customer loyalty for these bad experiences. Both times I was then told they couldn't honor their promise.

Changes to search and filters have RUINED this app. Having to tap next after only a few results only to lose the filter preferences, app autocorrects properly spelled terms into different words when I hit next meaning i lose what I was searching for, WAY too many taps to change filters, the same chinese items repeating over and over, no quality items in search results. Also, as of today crashes upon opening/ unusable. Customer service is USELESS or non-existent. It's like you want us to delete.

I don't know if It's the app or the site... but its so slow i found it barely usuable. Amazon also could use a major site redesign also. It isn't very user friendly. Very frustrating to wait for up to 30 seconds for each click. It adds up.

The app is just rubbish I can't believe that a company like amazon can't develop an app good enough for its products and customers. It crashes very often and every time I put what I'm looking for it gives me on the list items completely different, there are not many choices on the filter as you have through the Web site and even if you write bagpack for men it gives me Eyeglass Cases!!!!! ðŸ˜¡ With more than 10000 items to go through. Absolutely rubbish, it makes me furious...

I just bought a gift card and had trouble checking out. I chatted with customer service for 40 minutes and they asked me to call. They told me I couldnt use the gift card without a credit card, I dont have one, it worked fine with every other amazon gift cards I've had. It said my total was $25.97, I had a balance of $26.03, I couldnt continue past the payment selection page. i removed an item and payed $5.99 for shipping instead of getting free shipping for having a total of $25.

Been a customer for some time now and I have not had any problems with Amazon. When I did have questions I called the service department and immediately I was helped. I know that I can always depend on Amazon for any item I am interested in. As a Prime member things get even better. I also tend to do price checks even when I am in retail stores, alot of the time I can get a better price here on Amazon.

How could you trust a company that will give you 3 different prices depending on you're search history? I looked up a key chain for mass effect on 2 cell phones and 1 pc, 1 of them give me the price for 7.99$ the other for 22.75$ and one for 10$. All these searches were done with in 3 minute of each other. Just because they knew I was intrested in mass effect they were going to charge me an extra 15$ that's like 1.8x the regular price. So freaking glad I do all of my shopping in stores

I did not receive all of the items orders, the delivery person left the paper bags on the wet concrete instead of call me or k locking on the door. I do not like the invasion of privacy that this app requires to be down loaded. Although I did like the way the complete list of premissions were hidden until after you down load the app.

It was great, up until I needed to save things. It has a default list, so whenever I have to save something other than the list, I have to change the default list. Can you make a feature where when you try and save something it popups with all the lists you have and you click on the one you want?

Frustrating. Please change the filter feature on the search so that you can select more than 1 filter option at a time. As soon as you hit any filter it automatically refreshes the results and it takes forever. I want to be able to set all of my filters and then hit 'Done' to refresh my results all at once.

Who came up with the update changing the filter options and add the "Next" button at the bottom of the screen? Being taken back to the main screen everytime I chose a filter option is ridiculous. Amazon used to be my 1st, and often, only stop when shopping online but not anymore.

Disappointed: account disabled and orders cancelled because of buggy fraud system. They say my account has been hacked but it was me doing the orders. Support does not help. Account assistant cancelled all my orders. This is not just an app but a service as a whole. Jeff, put more money in Amazon research instead of space flights. Hire me to work for you and I'll fix this issue.

Over the past few months I've noticed that this app has become very laggy and unresponsive. I will have to uninstall it and only shop when I'm at a computer = Shopping less. It can take 5 or more taps for common actions, while others result in an unresponsive app for several seconds at a time, and then accidental presses. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note8 with 6gb of ram, 256gb+ of storage, and home wifi is testing at 274Mbps with the phone. I'm only having this problem with the Amazon app.

App is fine. The only issue I face which is quite annoying is the shipping notifications do not appear at all anymore for the past few orders. I have notifications enabled and still nothing. I have to constantly check the app to see where my package might be. Fix and I'll give five stars.

I like shopping through Amazon's app. However, idk what happened to it but it seems like the app changed. Or it's my phone. Everytime you want to see something, sometimes it shows it other times I get nothing but customers frequently bought this together. And it's taking forever to load. Like what gives Amazon. I used to love this app. Not so much right now. Might just uninstall it for a while. What's the point, it's useless.

The app is very slow to respond to almost every action (opening the filter menu, viewing images full-size, searching for answered questions, opening the search bar for past orders ...), and slow to load pages and product images. Clicking the x in the search bar clears the text for a moment, but when you start typing the old text reappears. Filtering search results is frustrating (and again, very slow) - you cannot filter by price until you select a category, and only one filter per menu open.

My go to for Shopping. Would love to have the option to choose my method of delivery. Tired of Canada Post with they're snail mail BS, Nothing ever arrives on the date it's much after. Doesn't pay to cheap out sometimes opting for the free shipping. Get what you pay for sometimes I suppose! Overall very happy with the App

So freaking slow, and buggy. Images take forever to load...literally they never load. I have no problems on my laptop viewing images of products, but the app just doesn't work. Menus sometimes don't load, searches sometimes don't do anything, the whole app is just super buggy.

I'm so sick of the uh oh there was a problem error when viewing any product page. I've gone through the troubleshooting steps to fix it so many times over the past year, but sooner or later it's always back. I'm on the latest Android version and in install any updates. This is absolutely maddening. Can you guys not fix the fundamental issues with your error handling approach please?

Ever since i canceled my prime account (which was right after i was charged for it) i cant get on my amazon app. I had to uninstall. I was expecting to be able to contact about a refund seeing as ive used NONE of the benefits this bill pay yet i cant seem to get on my account without everything shutting down

Irritating, I can only have one filter at a time yet the old version I could select multiple filters at any one time. There's also too much irrelevant content when I do a search for a specific brand or item e.g. Men's Batman baseball cap. The search result included children's and unisex caps as well as swimming cap, bean cap and army hat. I ended up cancelling my search and buying from elsewhere. I've used Amazon shopping less since my update to Version 20.1.2.100 revert back to the old app

I dont appreciate Amazon tricking me into doing a customer survey by promising me free merchandise only to found out you must pay SHIPPING for the merchandise when your done. Amazon doesn't mention the shipping cost until after the survey. I feel chumped. Free means free. Very disappointed. I won't involve myself with any other surveys from Amazon. As much stuff as I buy from Amazon I feel this is inappropriate.

What happened? I stupidly updated the app and now when I put in a search I get ONLY sponsored options and " brands related to your search" instead of infinite scroll options. I wanted to diminished my Amazon spending and this will definitely do it. Is there any way of going back to the previous version? I guess programmers for the app have to justify their existence and therefore keep "upgrading" the apps. This last one was definitely a downgrade.

Its hard to review something that doesn't work. The summation of my experience: Crashes. That is pretty much all I ever got from the app. It would briefly open, then show me a consolation picture of a cute dog, and crash with the "Uh Oh! Looks like something went wrong...." message. "Home" uh oh! "Account".. Uh Oh!.... "Search"...Uh Oh!.

Takes forever to load (just to add an item to your list). And it keeps going to the home page, after failing to load different products, time and time again. The old version didn't have these problems....

1 star is too much ... sluggish, poor responsiveness, inane filter behavior, no sorting options ... infantile gui ... discourages use ... Google search results linking to Amazon, viewed in the Amazon app yield NO RESULTS when the same Amazon product listing keywords are copied and pasted into the app search ... WORST shopping app, EVER

Who in there right mind thought autoplaying video ads was acceptable in a mobile shopping app? Well Amazon did. I just wanted to say thank you to the exec who thought it was a good idea to waste people's mobile bandwidth. You have finally given me the reason I needed to delete the app and break the buying cycle! Thank you!

This app is great, easy to use and the shipping for Prime is super fast. The main thing that is super annoying and the reason I didn't give it five stars if they ask you for a review within literally minutes of getting your item. How are you supposed to review an item if you haven't had time to use it. Amazon, maybe you should take an idea and snooze your reviews for a week or even 30 days.
